isDiscoverActive.title: Activates discover tab
isDiscoverActive.description: if true = discover tab is enable for users

isMultifactorauthActive.title: Activates Multifactorauth
isMultifactorauthActive.description: if true = Multifactorauth is enable for users (factors are tuned on server's config file)

userProfile.nameMinLength.title: Minimum length of user's profile name

userProfile.nameMaxLength.title: Maximum length of user's profile name

userProfile.nicknameMinLength.title: Minimum length of user's profile nickname

userProfile.nicknameMaxLength.title: Maximum length of user's profile nickname

userProfile.aboutMinLength.title: Minimum length of user's profile about

userProfile.aboutMaxLength.title: Maximum length of user's profile about

userProfile.avatarFileMaxSize.title: Maximum size of user's profile avatar

spaces.isEnabled.title: Activates Spaces
spaces.isEnabled.description: true - for product app, false - in platform

chat.bubbles.title: Activates bubbles in chat
chat.bubbles.description: if true = bubbles in chat are enable for users

badges.menu.dialogs.title: Activates budges in chat
badges.menu.dialogs.description: if true = budges in chat are enable for users

fileUploading.perfectRatio.title: The ratio of file download time (in ms) to size (in bytes)
fileUploading.perfectRatio.description: Required for dynamically resizing following chunks when loading. This ratio is compared with the ratio of the previous batch of chunks, therefore it is concluded whether it is necessary to increase or decrease the size of following chunks

fileUploading.maximumChunkSize.title: Maximum size of Chunk (in bytes) for sending to server

fileUploading.minimumChunkSize.title: Minimum size of Chunk (in bytes) for sending to server

upload.uploadEnabled.title: Determines whether the user can upload the file

search.profileSearchEnabled.title: Determines whether the user can perform profile search

search.localSearchCount.title: Determines amount of local search results

search.localSearchUsersFirst.title: Defines the order for local search results. (If true -  users first)

search.globalSearchUsersFirst.title: Defines the order for global search results. (If true -  users first)
